items.sissali: U ŋaa tuɔtɔreŋ la se na dɔŋɔ

items.english: I can speak Sissali a little?
items.sissali: ŋ jaŋ wo bul sissaliŋ muah?
Mi suliŋ bra bul Willa yee
ŋ jaŋ wo bra bul wiɛla?
ŋ jaŋ wo bul mua mua?
Mi jaŋ wo la ŋ tɛrɛbul ŋa wi?

items.english: Could you write that down for me?
items.sissali: ŋ jaŋ wo mwuŋsa bil apimi?
bɛ kuŋ ni ŋ ŋi ŋa?
chɛ bɛ ni ŋa ŋ tapul luluŋ?

items.english: I want to go shopping before watching the movie
items.sissali: Mi kyɛ di mi mu yor kia nɛ aŋ na ku beŋ seenee

items.english: I'll watch a movie after going shopping
items.sissali: Mi jaŋ beŋ seenee aŋ na mu yor kia

items.english: I don't have to go until tomorrow
items.sissali: Mi bi maka di mi mu di chie dei
Mi hɛ daha mi chɔkɔ ta bua lɛ nɛ

items.english: This is my first time here

items.sissali: Kerifi lebi ni dɔ minte fi lɛ

items.english: At what time does it start?
items.sissali: Bua bɛ lɛ nɛ u jaŋ Suomi?
U suomi Kerifi niwi lɛ nɛ
U jaŋ dieni maki biŋbelimiŋ baŋ gmɛɛ?

items.english: How many days would it take?
items.sissali: U jaŋ dieni maki tapula baŋ gmɛɛ?
Chɛŋ bɛ lɛ ni la hɛ?
ɛ mi jaŋ ŋaa mu dimi?

items.english: Can you show me where it is on the map?
items.sissali: ŋ jaŋ wo daki mi dimi u si hɛ lere-teniŋ tuouŋ?
Nia ni mi jaŋ yor tickitee
Le la ba si di kia
Nia nɛ la jaŋ bra chiŋ?

items.english: I'd like to get off here at...?
items.sissali: Mi jaŋ cho di mi tuu daha

items.english: How long is a trip to...?
items.sissali: ɛ nɛ u jaŋ dieni di la ni mu...?
U maka di mi chu pupu nyu gbaŋa nɛ?
Mi jaŋ wo la ŋ tɛrɛbul ŋa wii

items.english: Do you have a room for tonight?
we've booked a room in the name of...
Can I leave my bags here?
I want a room with a good view
is there a message for me?
I left my key in the room
Can I do money exchange here?
Can I have an extra bed?
How much is an extra bed per night?
Can you call a taxi for me?

items.sissali: Mi ŋaa nu si bi naŋmia ka di nɛ

items.english: I'd like a table for two please
items.sissali: Mi jaŋ cho nia banlia dihɔniŋ
Mi jaŋ wo na ma ku diile teniŋ?

items.english: Can I have a drink menu?
items.sissali: Mi jaŋ wo na ma ku nyuala teniŋ?
Bɛ nɛ u maka di mi ŋaa?

items.english: Can I have the bill please
items.sissali: Leŋ di mi na mi chimiŋ
Nia nɛ yɔbɔ  la si kpaki daha hɛ?

items.english: Can you write down the price?
items.sissali: ŋ jaŋ wo mwiŋsi u yaliŋ pimi?
ŋ jaŋ wo liisi yaliŋ ta?(alabraka)
ŋ jaŋ wo joŋo hɛ lɔkɔ lɛ?
Mi ta ye bi beŋ nɛ

items.english: Can I have this in size...?
items.sissali: Mi jaŋ wo la kula si wuka maki...?
Niɛ nɛ mi jaŋ wo teeŋ?
Mi jaŋ wo laa teniŋ la si daka ani mi time nɛ?

items.english: Can I have a bag please?

items.sissali: Bua bɛ lɛ nɛ ba suri
Bua bɛ lɛ nɛ ba see

items.english: Do I have to pay to get in?
items.sissali: U maki mi teeŋ nɛ aŋ na wo ju?

items.english: How many are you in your family?
Would you like to something together?
Would you like to go for a walk with me?
Would you like to watch a movie?
Can I buy you a drink?
Do you mind if sit here(to join someone)
I won't do it without a condom
Will you go out with me?
I don't think it is working out
I don't want to see you again
Do you have a pain killer?
I have run out of medication
I need a doctor who can speak Sissali
